```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library("tidyverse")
library("dplyr")
library("plotly")
```

1. Importing the Data
1.1. Housing Prices Database
```{r}


interest_rate <- read_csv("D:/DataScienceMBA/TCC/Database/FIM09.20220819123145.csv", show_col_types = FALSE)
view(interest_rate)

names(interest_rate)
filterIR <- interest_rate %>% transmute(`Interest Rate`,`TLIST(M1)`,VALUE)
filterIR
new_names <- c("type","ref","InterestRate")

names(filterIR) <- new_names



```
```{r}



p<-filterIR  %>% 
ggplot(aes(x =(round(ref/100)), y = InterestRate, group = type, color = factor(type))) + geom_line()   + ylab("Interest Rate")


plotly::ggplotly(p)


```
